DO NOT EDIT! -->## Getting started``` bashpip install audio-journal```After you’ve update the `~/.audio-journal/config` with your [pageID](https://github.com/ramnes/notion-sdk-py/discussions/31) and[integration key](https://www.notion.so/my-integrations)``` bashaudio_journal_start```## Demohttps://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5474861/236587909-a7b0578b-b742-4571-80a2-65e249c43fca.mp4## Why?I wish I journaled more often. The ability to look back through theyears, reflect and remember events long past is invaluable.While the benefits of hand written journaling are clear, forcing one toslow down, to organize one’s thoughts, I find the 5x slow down makes ita non-starter. So instead lets optimize for gross word count!## Future work- Offer alternative storage options- Interface with a mic, always on, wait for wake word
